Step %1$d
Draw the car roof with a half-oval shape at the top.
Draw the curved car body below the roof.
Add a curved line at the front of the car.
Draw two arches on the lower left side for the wheels.
Draw two windows at the top of the car body.
Add four circles as the car wheels.
Draw small circles inside the wheels as rims.
Add door details, body lines, and mirrors to the car.
Draw the front bumper of the car.
Add two big circles in front as headlights and draw a smiling mouth.
Add details to the rear lights.
Draw the exhaust at the back of the car.
Add details to the door handles.
Draw lines on the car hood.
Add details to the mirrors.
Color the car body.
Color the wheels and rims.
Color the windows and lights.
Add shadows and light effects.
Cute cartoon car finished!
Draw the basic front view shape of the car with curved lines at the top and sides.
Add a line for the lower bumper and two small boxes as the wheel bases.
Draw two windshield areas and the hood with two curved lines.
Add four circles on the left and right as headlights.
Draw the grill (air vent) in the center of the front bumper.
Add details to the windshield and hood, such as lines and curves.
Draw two seats, a center mirror, and a steering wheel inside the windshield.
Add side mirrors on the left and right of the car.
Add details to the front grill and a logo in the center.
Color the whole car for a great result!
Draw the basic front shape of the firetruck with two big boxes and a rectangle below.
Add light details on top of the cabin and the right side of the truck.
Draw the front wheel and right side cabin details.
Draw the truck body line to the back and add the rear wheel arch.
Add windows and doors at the back and the rear wheel.
Draw the ladder on top of the truck with two long parallel lines.
Add details to the ladder frame on top of the truck.
Complete the ladder frame details and lines on the truck body.
Add final details like lights, grill, and door handles.
Color the whole firetruck to make it look cool!
Draw two big circles as the sports car wheels.
Add rim details to both wheels.
Draw arches above the wheels as front and rear fenders.
Draw the roof and lower body lines, making the car look sleek and low.
Connect the front and rear body lines, then add rim details.
Draw curved lines for the hood and roof.
Add doors, windows, and body line details.
Draw details for the headlights, taillights, and side mirrors.
Emphasize all the lines and shapes of the sports car.
Color the whole car to look like a real Lamborghini!
Draw the basic cabin shape with a box at the top and a long line to the back.
Add side body details with jagged lines for the fenders and rear bed.
Draw the front of the truck and the arches for the front and rear fenders.
Clarify the front shape by adding vertical and horizontal lines.
Thicken the body lines and add details to the cabin for realism.
Draw the front and side windows with curved lines inside the cabin.
Draw two big ovals at the lower left for the rear and front left wheels.
Add two big ovals at the lower right for the front and rear right wheels.
Thicken all four wheels by adding outer lines to each oval.
Draw small circles in the center of each wheel as hubs.
Add hub details to all four wheels with circles and small lines.
Draw jagged patterns on all four tires to make them look like monster truck tires.
Draw mirrors on both sides of the cabin.
Draw two headlights and a grill at the front of the truck.
Add details to the lights and grill with vertical lines.
Draw the rear bed with slanted and horizontal lines.
Add detail lines to the rear bed for clarity.
Draw the front and rear axles connecting the left and right wheels.
Color the headlights yellow and the grill dark.
Color the whole truck green, the wheels gray, and other details as you like.
Color the background blue as the base.
Draw the basic car body with curved and straight lines for the roof, hood, and trunk.
Add curved and vertical lines to define the body and fenders.
Draw two big windows at the top of the car body.
Add door details, handles, headlights, and taillights.
Draw two wheels with rims at the bottom of the car.
Add mirror, bumper, and lower body line details.
Draw the siren on the roof and extra details on the front hood.
Add a star logo and the word POLICE on the car door.
Color the whole police car as shown, including windows, body, wheels, lights, and siren.
Color the background blue as the base.
Draw the basic race car body with curved and sharp lines at the front.
Add surface details and separation lines on the sides and top of the car.
Draw the front wing with a box shape at the lower front.
Add the front wheel with rim and suspension details.
Draw the rear wheels on the left and right with rim details.
Draw the rear wing at the top back of the car.
Add cockpit and driver helmet details in the center of the car.
Clarify all details, lines, and accents on the race car body.
Color the whole race car as shown, including the red body, wheels, and driver helmet.
Draw a horizontal rectangle at the top as the bus roof.
Add vertical and horizontal lines below to form the bus body.
Clarify the bus body by closing the right side and thickening the bottom line.
Draw two arches below the body for the front and rear wheel spaces.
Draw two circles inside the arches as the bus wheels.
Add headlights and detail lines at the front of the bus.
Draw rectangular windows along the side of the bus.
Write "SCHOOL BUS" on the side and add detail lines.
Color the whole bus yellow and the windows light blue.
Done! Your school bus is complete and ready to go.
Draw a trapezoid as the base of the tractor cabin at the top.
Add two rectangles inside the trapezoid for the front and side windows.
Draw the cabin roof and start a curved line down for the tractor body.
Continue the body line down and right, forming the front and bottom of the tractor.
Add a big circle at the back as the rear wheel and a small circle at the front as the front wheel.
Draw wheel details and add the exhaust on top of the cabin.
Add grill details at the front and accents on the tractor body.
Clarify all details, add headlights and wheel accents.
Color the tractor body yellow and red, and the windows light blue.
Done! The tractor is ready for the field.
Draw two rectangles, one big (bed) and one small (cabin) on the right.
Add a slanted line from the top of the cabin to the front to form the truck hood.
Connect lines to form the front and bottom of the truck.
Draw arches below the bed and cabin for the front and rear wheel spaces.
Add two big circles as the front and rear wheels.
Draw wheel details and add mirrors and headlights.
Add windows to the cabin and detail lines to the truck bed.
Clarify all details, add door handles and body accents.
Color the truck bed green and the wheels gray and other details.
Done! The truck is ready to carry goods.
